# RCSService.FileDownloadRequest.Metadata

**Structure**

A structure that contains download metadata from the content server.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Metadata
```

## Overview

You receive this type as the return value from the [doc://com.apple.availability/documentation/TelephonyMessagingKit/RCSService/download(_:)] method of [doc://com.apple.availability/documentation/TelephonyMessagingKit/RCSService].

## Accessing download request properties

- **contentType**: The content type provided by the content server.
- **suggestedFileName**: The file name provided by the content server.

## Transferring files

- **upload(_:)**: Uploads a file to the RCS content server.
- **RCSService.FileUploadRequest**: A structure that represents an RCS file upload request.
- **RCSService.FileUploadRequest.Metadata**: A structure that contains upload metadata from the content server.
- **download(_:)**: Downloads a file from the RCS content server.
- **RCSService.FileDownloadRequest**: A structure that represents an RCS file download request.

## Conforms To

- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
